info.name: StackExchange Chat Minimal Dark (Mobile + Desktop)
info.description:
Very minimal style, made to fit as many messages as possible in screen. Disables rounding and makes everything dark.

Same theme works both on mobile chat and desktop chat.

NOTE: This style changes often.  Sorry for the potential inconvenience caused by that.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.2.2:
Okay, I can live with hats, but they are just no-no on chat, especially the galaxy brain and such.

v1.2.1:
Attempt to fix a bug on loading screen on mobile.

v1.2:
- Fixed a bug where loading screen would have dark background on mobile site.
- Changed loading message's color on desktop and mobile
- Fixed a bug where user pictures would load at 64x64 instead of 32x32 on profile embeds.
- Added proper coloring to tags on profile embeds.
- Updated color of question tags.

v1.1:
Changed color of tab complete.

v1.0:
- First version with a changelog and version number.
- Reduced size of images in Twitter embeds to half.
